Class JdbcRepositoryFactory

java.lang.Object
cat.uvic.teknos.dam.kamika.repositories.jdbc.JdbcRepositoryFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
RepositoryFactory
public class JdbcRepositoryFactory extends Object implements RepositoryFactory
Factory class that provides JDBC repository instances. Implements RepositoryFactory to ensure compatibility.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description

    Default constructor.

    Constructor that receives a shared data source for all repositories.

  • Constructor Details

    • JdbcRepositoryFactory

      public JdbcRepositoryFactory()
      Default constructor. Initializes the factory without a data source.

    • JdbcRepositoryFactory

      public JdbcRepositoryFactory(SingleConnectionDataSource dataSource)
      Constructor that receives a shared data source for all repositories.
      Parameters:
      dataSource - The data source used to obtain database connections.
